title: ICE: rustdoc: unable to fulfill trait

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code code from glacier/fixed ./82830.rs ```Rust trait A { type B; } type MaybeBox = >>::B; struct P { t: MaybeBox

} impl A for P { type B = N; } fn main() { let t: MaybeBox

; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustdoc 1.66.0-nightly (89e4e1f1b 2022-09-22) binary: rustdoc commit-hash: 89e4e1f1b32e2a88cf696337f77e10273142c1a0 commit-date: 2022-09-22 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.66.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` ### Error output `rustdoc ./82830.rs` ``` ```

Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Unable to fulfill trait DefId(2:9577 ~ core[18c4]::panic::unwind_safe::RefUnwindSafe) for 'P': [FulfillmentError(Obligation(predicate=Binder(TraitPredicate(

, polarity:Positive), []), depth=2),Cycle([Obligation(predicate=Binder(TraitPredicate(

, polarity:Positive), []), depth=2)]))]', /rustc/89e4e1f1b32e2a88cf696337f77e10273142c1a0/compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/auto_trait.rs:212:17 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fadeada2ff0 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h2ca6883764224c50 at /rustc/89e4e1f1b32e2a88cf696337f77e10273142c1a0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7fadeada2ff0 -
